description.value:
Once per day when you start your turn at 0 hit points or fewer, your body transforms into a slightly different variation of yourself, although your game statistics and equipment don't change. When you transform, you regain hit points equal to your bloodied value, you can stand up as a free action, and any adverse effects you are subject to end immediately.

In addition, your attacks deal extra radiant damage equal to your Charisma modifier until the end of the encounter.

Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 121.
